question: What reasons did Gregor consider for not going to work?
references:
[{"content": "But that would be extremely strained and suspicious as in five
years of service Gregor had never once yet been ill", "start_index": 5783, "end_index": 5897}, {"content": "His boss would
certainly come round with the doctor from the medical insurance
company, accuse his parents of having a lazy son, and accept the

question: What did Gregor's family react when they heard him speak?
references:
[{"content": ""Did you understand a word of all that?" the chief clerk asked his
parents, "surely he's not trying to make fools of us"", "start_index": 23014, "end_index": 23134}, {"content": ""Oh, God!"
called his mother, who was already in tears, "he could be seriously ill
and we're making him suffer. Grete! Grete!" she then cried", "start_index": 23136, "end_index": 23277}, {"content": ""That was the voice of an animal", said the chief clerk, with a

question: How did Gregor's sister assist him in moving within his room?
references:
[{"content": "Very soon his
sister noticed Gregor's new way of entertaining himself-he had, after
all, left traces of the adhesive from his feet as he crawled about-and
got it into her head to make it as easy as possible for him by removing

the desk", "start_index": 62560, "end_index": 62866}]

question: What did Gregor plan to announce on Christmas day?
references: [{"content": "Gregor thought about it quite hard and decided he\nwould let them know what he planned with a grand announcement of it on\nChristmas day", "start_index": 53389, "end_index": 53523}]

question: What was Gregor's physical condition when he tried to open the door?
references:
[{"content": "The first few times he tried to climb up on the smooth

question: What was the reaction of the chief clerk upon hearing a noise in Gregor's room?
references: [{"content": "\"Something's fallen down in there\", said the chief clerk in the room on\nthe left", "start_index": 15513, "end_index": 15593}]

question: Why did Gregor retreat under the couch?
references:
[{"content": "Hardly aware of what he was doing
other than a slight feeling of shame, he hurried under the couch", "start_index": 43123, "end_index": 43221}, {"content": "It
pressed down on his back a little, and he was no longer able to lift
his head, but he nonetheless felt immediately at ease and his only
regret was that his body was too broad to get it all underneath", "start_index": 43223, "end_index": 43425}]

question: What incident caused the three gentlemen to become slightly annoyed?
references:
[{"content": "He rushed up to them
with his arms spread out and attempted to drive them back into their
room at the same time as trying to block their view of Gregor with his
body. Now they did become a little annoyed, and it was not clear

realisation that they had had a neighbour like Gregor in the next room
